lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. announced yesterday that Kansas City defensive end Jared Allen had been suspended for the first two games of the 2007 season after two arrests for driving under the influence.The 25-year-old Allen entered a diversion program in connection with the first charge and pleaded no contest to the second.
